ComicInfo.Summary:
War Is Heck [Part Four]: The Top Ten Reasons to Hate Sally Floyd!: Sally spreads her specific brand of mayhem across the Marvel Universe.
Costume Division: Death of an Android [Part Four]: Danny solves the mystery of the "murder" of ARCH-E, and Korg has a hard time dealing with the real cause of his friend's death.
Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines [Part Five]: Sally begins drinking heavily as she continues to report on the devastation the Hulk has brought to New York. Sally and Ben meet up just in time to watch Sentry join the fray.
ComicInfo.Title: War Is Heck [Part Four]: The Top Ten Reasons to Hate Sally Floyd!; Costume Division: Death of an Android [Part Four]; Embedded: Behind Enemy Lines [Part Five]
